title: Why North Korea would want to go to war for Russia
description: US officials are worried about what Kim could be receiving from Putin. Sending troops is a high price for whatever North Korea is getting from Russia.

title: North Korea launches a new intercontinental ballistic missile designed to threaten US
description: North Korea confirmed the launch hours after its neighbors detected the firing of what they suspected was a new weapon.

title: President Biden sets up new AI guardrails for military, intelligence agencies
description:
The White House issued its first national security memorandum outlining the use of artificial intelligence for the military and intelligence agencies. The White House also shared a shortened copy of the memo with the public.
The new memo sets up guidelines fo…

title: Putin hosts a summit in a bid to show the West it can't keep Russia off the global stage
description: The Kremlin will be able to talk to major players like India and China about expanding trade and bypassing Western sanctions.

title: Cybercriminals Pose a Greater Threat of Disruptive US Election Hacks Than Russian or China
description: A report distributed by the US Department of Homeland Security warned that financially motivated cybercriminals are more likely to attack US election infrastructure than state-backed hackers.

title: How America Must Stand Up to Putin’s ‘Axis of Evil’
description: Our columnists write why the U.S. must strictly enforce current sanctions on Russia and sanctions on entities supporting Russian aggression.

title: China's muted response to the Russia-North Korea alliance could come at a cost
description: China's response to reports of North Korea sending soldiers to Russia could undercut its efforts to improve its trading relationships with the EU.

title: North Korea sending troops into Ukraine could supercharge an already-close partnership with Russia
description: South Korea says 1,500 North Korean troops have been sent to aid Russia in Ukraine. Experts say the partnership poses a significant global risk.

title: North Korea Fires Multiple Missile Tests in Show of Force on U.S. Election Day
description: Tensions between the Koreas are at their highest point in years as Kim has repeatedly flaunted his expanding nuclear weapon and missile programs.

title: The Untold Story of Trump's Failed Attempt to Overthrow Venezuela's President
description: A successful CIA hack of Venezuela's military payroll system, insider fights for spy agency resources, and messy opposition politics: A WIRED investigation reveals a secret Trump-era attempt to oust autocratic ruler Nicolás Maduro.

title: A US airstrike in the Middle East is meant to remind Iran that nothing is out of reach
description: The US on Wednesday targeted underground Houthi militia weapons stores in Yemen using long-range B-2 stealth bombers.

title: US says B-2 stealth bombers struck hidden Houthi weapons, sending a message to foes that nothing is out of reach
description: The US military struck underground weapons storage sites that the Houthis use to fuel their Red Sea attacks.

title: Who is Trump intelligence pick Tulsi Gabbard, accused of repeating Russian talking points?
description: The former Democratic congresswoman has emerged as one of Trump's most loyal backers.

title: Appeals made after WW2 plane crash discovery
description: The crash happened on 6 August 1945, the same day United States military dropped a nuclear bomb on Hiroshima.

title: Exclusive-Qatar LNG sales to key Asian markets confronted by US, UAE rivalry
description: Qatar is finding it hard to agree new deals to supply liquefied natural gas (LNG) to Japan and South Korea as rising competition from the U.S. and elsewhere ...

The White House issued its first national security memorandum outlining the use of artificial intelligence for the military and intelligence agencies. The White House also shared a shortened copy of the memo with the public.
The new memo sets up guidelines fo…

title: Putin hosts a summit in a bid to show the West it can't keep Russia off the global stage
description: The Kremlin will be able to talk to major players like India and China about expanding trade and bypassing Western sanctions.

title: Cybercriminals Pose a Greater Threat of Disruptive US Election Hacks Than Russian or China
description: A report distributed by the US Department of Homeland Security warned that financially motivated cybercriminals are more likely to attack US election infrastructure than state-backed hackers.

title: How America Must Stand Up to Putin’s ‘Axis of Evil’
description: Our columnists write why the U.S. must strictly enforce current sanctions on Russia and sanctions on entities supporting Russian aggression.

title: China's muted response to the Russia-North Korea alliance could come at a cost
description: China's response to reports of North Korea sending soldiers to Russia could undercut its efforts to improve its trading relationships with the EU.

title: North Korea sending troops into Ukraine could supercharge an already-close partnership with Russia
description: South Korea says 1,500 North Korean troops have been sent to aid Russia in Ukraine. Experts say the partnership poses a significant global risk.

title: North Korea Fires Multiple Missile Tests in Show of Force on U.S. Election Day
description: Tensions between the Koreas are at their highest point in years as Kim has repeatedly flaunted his expanding nuclear weapon and missile programs.

title: The Untold Story of Trump's Failed Attempt to Overthrow Venezuela's President
description: A successful CIA hack of Venezuela's military payroll system, insider fights for spy agency resources, and messy opposition politics: A WIRED investigation reveals a secret Trump-era attempt to oust autocratic ruler Nicolás Maduro.

title: A US airstrike in the Middle East is meant to remind Iran that nothing is out of reach
description: The US on Wednesday targeted underground Houthi militia weapons stores in Yemen using long-range B-2 stealth bombers.

title: US says B-2 stealth bombers struck hidden Houthi weapons, sending a message to foes that nothing is out of reach
description: The US military struck underground weapons storage sites that the Houthis use to fuel their Red Sea attacks.

title: Who is Trump intelligence pick Tulsi Gabbard, accused of repeating Russian talking points?
description: The former Democratic congresswoman has emerged as one of Trump's most loyal backers.

title: Appeals made after WW2 plane crash discovery
description: The crash happened on 6 August 1945, the same day United States military dropped a nuclear bomb on Hiroshima.

title: Exclusive-Qatar LNG sales to key Asian markets confronted by US, UAE rivalry
description: Qatar is finding it hard to agree new deals to supply liquefied natural gas (LNG) to Japan and South Korea as rising competition from the U.S. and elsewhere ...

title: Bowen: Iran faces hard choices between risks of escalation or looking weak
description: International editor Jeremy Bowen examines what Iran's response might be to Israel's latest attack.

title: US stealth bombers strike 5 Houthi weapons bunkers
description: Central Command said the attacks hit missiles and other weapons components used by the militia group.

title: With Putin Calls, It’s More Clear Than Ever That Elon Musk Is a National Security Threat
description: The billionaire has been chatting with Russia's authoritarian leader for years while he stumps for Trump and commands huge government contracts.

title: Saudi Arabia's ruler used to be one of Trump's biggest fans. This time it's complicated.
description: The Middle East's in chaos, and Gulf state leaders may fear that Donald Trump will make it worse.

title: The B-2 stealth bomber used to hit the Houthis was built to strike the toughest targets
description: The aircraft was built to slip past defenses to drop nuclear and conventional bombs, including a 30,000-pound bunker buster.

title: Why North Korea would want to go to war for Russia
description: US officials are worried about what Kim could be receiving from Putin. Sending troops is a high price for whatever North Korea is getting from Russia.

title: North Korea launches a new intercontinental ballistic missile designed to threaten US
description: North Korea confirmed the launch hours after its neighbors detected the firing of what they suspected was a new weapon.

title: Why North Korea would want to go to war for Russia
description: US officials are worried about what Kim could be receiving from Putin. Sending troops is a high price for whatever North Korea is getting from Russia.

title: North Korea launches a new intercontinental ballistic missile designed to threaten US
description: North Korea confirmed the launch hours after its neighbors detected the firing of what they suspected was a new weapon.

title: President Biden sets up new AI guardrails for military, intelligence agencies
description:
The White House issued its first national security memorandum outlining the use of artificial intelligence for the military and intelligence agencies. The White House also shared a shortened copy of the memo with the public.
The new memo sets up guidelines fo…

title: Putin hosts a summit in a bid to show the West it can't keep Russia off the global stage
description: The Kremlin will be able to talk to major players like India and China about expanding trade and bypassing Western sanctions.

title: Cybercriminals Pose a Greater Threat of Disruptive US Election Hacks Than Russian or China
description: A report distributed by the US Department of Homeland Security warned that financially motivated cybercriminals are more likely to attack US election infrastructure than state-backed hackers.

title: How America Must Stand Up to Putin’s ‘Axis of Evil’
description: Our columnists write why the U.S. must strictly enforce current sanctions on Russia and sanctions on entities supporting Russian aggression.

title: China's muted response to the Russia-North Korea alliance could come at a cost
description: China's response to reports of North Korea sending soldiers to Russia could undercut its efforts to improve its trading relationships with the EU.

title: North Korea sending troops into Ukraine could supercharge an already-close partnership with Russia
description: South Korea says 1,500 North Korean troops have been sent to aid Russia in Ukraine. Experts say the partnership poses a significant global risk.

title: North Korea Fires Multiple Missile Tests in Show of Force on U.S. Election Day
description: Tensions between the Koreas are at their highest point in years as Kim has repeatedly flaunted his expanding nuclear weapon and missile programs.

title: The Untold Story of Trump's Failed Attempt to Overthrow Venezuela's President
description: A successful CIA hack of Venezuela's military payroll system, insider fights for spy agency resources, and messy opposition politics: A WIRED investigation reveals a secret Trump-era attempt to oust autocratic ruler Nicolás Maduro.

title: A US airstrike in the Middle East is meant to remind Iran that nothing is out of reach
description: The US on Wednesday targeted underground Houthi militia weapons stores in Yemen using long-range B-2 stealth bombers.

title: US says B-2 stealth bombers struck hidden Houthi weapons, sending a message to foes that nothing is out of reach
description: The US military struck underground weapons storage sites that the Houthis use to fuel their Red Sea attacks.

title: Who is Trump intelligence pick Tulsi Gabbard, accused of repeating Russian talking points?
description: The former Democratic congresswoman has emerged as one of Trump's most loyal backers.

title: Appeals made after WW2 plane crash discovery
description: The crash happened on 6 August 1945, the same day United States military dropped a nuclear bomb on Hiroshima.

title: Exclusive-Qatar LNG sales to key Asian markets confronted by US, UAE rivalry
description: Qatar is finding it hard to agree new deals to supply liquefied natural gas (LNG) to Japan and South Korea as rising competition from the U.S. and elsewhere ...

title: Bowen: Iran faces hard choices between risks of escalation or looking weak
description: International editor Jeremy Bowen examines what Iran's response might be to Israel's latest attack.

title: US stealth bombers strike 5 Houthi weapons bunkers
description: Central Command said the attacks hit missiles and other weapons components used by the militia group.

title: With Putin Calls, It’s More Clear Than Ever That Elon Musk Is a National Security Threat
description: The billionaire has been chatting with Russia's authoritarian leader for years while he stumps for Trump and commands huge government contracts.

title: Saudi Arabia's ruler used to be one of Trump's biggest fans. This time it's complicated.
description: The Middle East's in chaos, and Gulf state leaders may fear that Donald Trump will make it worse.
